snippet.title: Devious Designs (amiga)
snippet.description:
Intro and gameplay (2:39) from levels 15-29. I skipped few easier levels from between. Game has 59 increasingly difficult levels. The evil doctor needs to be defeated in a shoot em up level for every 10 levels.

I cropped the screen for widescreen resolution cutting out score, timer and remaining lives display. Levels have time limit, you can hear a clicking sound when time is running short.

Publisher: Image Works (1991)

http://www.lemonamiga.com/games/details.php?id=1983
